title: Shed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small independent sandwich and coffee/tea shop in the center of Reading (off the beaten track), turns into a cocktail bar at night. Offers 2 listed vegan choices on the small menu and several others that can be made vegan. Soup is normally vegan. Also on the menu is a vegan cake/flapjack/dessert option.
